name: 마켓경기
paginationMethod: Page-based pagination (40 items per page by default)

rateLimit.details: Aggressive rate limiting (HTTP 429) for bot traffic. Requires proper User-Agent headers and reasonable request intervals.

errorDetails.message: Direct web scraping blocked due to aggressive rate limiting
errorDetails.accessRestrictions: Naver SmartStore has strong bot protection. Direct scraping returns error pages.

recommendedApproach: Use official Naver Commerce API (https://apicenter.commerce.naver.com) or partner directly with 경기도농수산진흥원 for data access
